  • java.lang.Object

    @MetaInfServices
public class EbeanConfig
extends Object
implements com.github.zhengframework.configuration.ConfigurationDefine

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private List<Class<?>> classes
      List of interesting classes such as entities, embedded, ScalarTypes, Listeners, Finders, Controllers etc.
      private String databasePlatformName
      The database platform name.
      private boolean ddlCreateOnly 
      private boolean ddlExtra 
      private boolean ddlGenerate 
      private boolean ddlRun 
      private javax.persistence.EnumType defaultEnumType 
      private boolean defaultServer
      Set to true if this is the default/primary database.
      private boolean enable 
      private boolean idGeneratorAutomatic
      When true we do not need explicit GeneratedValue mapping.
      private List<String> mappingLocations
      The mappingLocations for searching xml mapping.
      private String name
      The Database name. if use group, will auto override by group name.
      private List<String> packages
      The packages that are searched for interesting classes.
      private boolean register
      Set to true to register this Database with the DB singleton.

    • 字段详细资料

      • enable

        private boolean enable

      • name

        private String name
        The Database name. if use group, will auto override by group name.

      • register

        private boolean register
        Set to true to register this Database with the DB singleton.

      • defaultServer

        private boolean defaultServer
        Set to true if this is the default/primary database.

      • classes

        private List<Class<?>> classes
        List of interesting classes such as entities, embedded, ScalarTypes, Listeners, Finders, Controllers etc.

      • packages

        private List<String> packages
        The packages that are searched for interesting classes. Only used when classes is empty/not explicitly specified.

      • databasePlatformName

        private String databasePlatformName
        The database platform name. Used to imply a DatabasePlatform to use.

      • defaultEnumType

        private javax.persistence.EnumType defaultEnumType

      • ddlGenerate

        private boolean ddlGenerate

      • ddlRun

        private boolean ddlRun

      • ddlExtra

        private boolean ddlExtra

      • ddlCreateOnly

        private boolean ddlCreateOnly

      • mappingLocations

        private List<String> mappingLocations
        The mappingLocations for searching xml mapping.

      • idGeneratorAutomatic

        private boolean idGeneratorAutomatic
        When true we do not need explicit GeneratedValue mapping.
